about.details:
Incorporated in 1991, Godrej Agrovet is India based agri-business Company offering products including Animal Feed, Crop Protection, Oil Palm, Dairy and Poultry and Processed Foods. Godrej Agrovet is leading animal feed company and the largest crude palm oil producer in India.

Product Portfolio

1. In animal feed business, the products comprises cattle feed, poultry feed (broiler and layer), aqua feed (fish and shrimp) and specialty feed. The products are produced at 35 facilities and sold through 4000 distributors across India.

2. In crop protection business, company produces plant growth regulators, organic manures, generic agrochemicals and specialized herbicides. The products are sold in India and 24 countries. Company has over 6000 distributors in this business segment.

3. In oil palm business, the products include crude palm oil, crude palm kernel oil and palm kernel cake. Company owns five palm oil mills.

4. The dairy business is operate through a subsidiary Creamline Dairy. Company sell milk and milk based products under the 'Jersey' in 5 south India states. Company own nine milk processing units. Company has 2,500 milk product distributors and 50 retail parlors.

5. Company also produce processed poultry and vegetarian products under the brands 'Real Good Chicken' and 'Yummiez'.

Company Strengths:
1. Pan-India presence with extensive supply and distribution network.
2. Diversified businesses with five business verticals.
3. Emphasis on R&D
4. Part of the Godrej group. Part of strong 'Godrej' brand.
5. Leading position in the segments it operate.

contactDetails.full_address: Godrej Agrovet Limited, Godrej One 3rd Floor Pirojshanagar, Eastern Express Highway, Vikhroli (East) Mumbai 400 079

faqs.question: What is the Godrej Agrovet IPO?
faqs.answer:
Godrej Agrovet IPO is a main-board IPO of equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹1,157.31 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹460 per share. The minimum order quantity is 32.

The IPO opens on October 4, 2017, and closes on October 6, 2017.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE, NSE.

faqs.question: How to apply in Godrej Agrovet IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Godrej Agrovet IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Godrej Agrovet IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Godrej Agrovet IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Godrej Agrovet IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Godrej Agrovet IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Godrej Agrovet IPO opens on October 4, 2017 and closes on October 6, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Godrej Agrovet IPO?
faqs.answer: Godrej Agrovet IPO lot size is 32, and the minimum amount required is ₹14,720.

faqs.question: How to apply for Godrej Agrovet IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Godrej Agrovet IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Godrej Agrovet IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Godrej Agrovet IPO will be done on Thursday, October 12, 2017, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, October 13, 2017. Check the Godrej Agrovet IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Godrej Agrovet IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Godrej Agrovet IPO listing date is on Monday, October 16, 2017.
